about_the_game:
A unique and exhilarating game is here, where you become a sponge character and clean up a messy room until it shines!

Experience the satisfaction of a cute sponge character scrubbing away dirt and grime with adorable movements and visuals. But it’s not just about cleaning—enjoy the thrill of dodging chasing enemies and sometimes even fighting back as you tidy up the room.

Once you play, you’ll definitely get hooked!

How to Clean

You’re a sponge! Just run over dirty spots, and watch the grime disappear. Got a mess in hard-to-reach places? No problem—spray water to clean up those tricky spots. Make the house sparkle and enjoy the satisfaction!

How to Clear a Level

Fill the cleaning meter to 100% to clear the stage!
Once you’re familiar with the basics, try optimizing your cleaning strategy to aim for a high score. It’s a fun challenge!

Refresh Yourself When Dirty

As you clean, you’ll get dirty too. When that happens, look for refresh points around the house to clean yourself up. Staying fresh is key to keeping up the cleaning momentum!

Fight Off Mischievous Kids!

A playful boy will run around the house trying to disrupt your cleaning efforts. Don’t worry—spray him with water to chase him away! Stay focused and keep the house spotless while handling this mischievous intruder.

name: ROOM WASHER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2.1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X 8-Core Processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2.1 GB available space

short_description: A thrilling game full of satisfaction as you become a sponge character and clean up rooms! Clear stages by scrubbing away dirt with a cute character while dodging enemies. Once you play, you’ll be hooked on the fun!
